title: Water from the Rock and Victory over Amalek
summary: Exodus 17 recounts how God provides water from a rock at Horeb when the people complain again. Later, Israel defeats Amalek in battle as Moses raises his hands in prayer with help from Aaron and Hur.

faq.question: How did Moses get water for the people?
faq.answer: By striking a rock as God instructed, water flowed out for the people to drink.

faq.question: How was Israel victorious against Amalek?
faq.answer: As long as Moses held up his hands, Israel prevailed. Aaron and Hur helped him keep them raised.
